title: [PLEASE!]Swap OCE Team Builder for Normal Draft.
body:
Nobody uses team builder. its a dead queue and even on weekends it cant take 10-30 minutes to get a game started.

Can we please get some traction and community support for a trial replacement of Team Builder with Normal Draft Pick.

Normals is where you should be practising. But I see little benefit when there is no clue of matchups. people in OCE in lower ranks just don't understand putting the team together properly because we never get the opportunity to practise a REAL game.

The Normal Blind Pick queue is no better than ARAM and I get very salty when I end up with a matchup I would NEVER have opted into depending on pick and bans. There is just no opportunity to pick or counter.

replies.body:
I veto this and say we should get a permanent Twisted Treeline queue. Reducing the amount of people needed from ten to six will surely have a higher concentration of games being made than there is now.

Also, this probably doesn't belong on this board. Try [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous).

i completely agree, although team builder is agreat idea and probably works on some of the busier srevers (ie. NA) but in a server with a small player pool it takes far too long to find anyone, let alone a whole team, i know it might seem like a down grade to an older version of lol but it genuinely worked better for the oce server
